title: Creatures of the Ice Age Animals of the Air
name: Ian Perrier & Sarah Ubu

title: I wanted to make a silly comic for a presentation
name: Morgan Pea
text:
I tried to make an experimental comic for my presentation on closure. Using ScottMcCloud's descriptions of the 6 kinds of panel transitions and a regular six sided die i made up this idea for a one person comic jam. Seen at the link.  It's pretty silly.  

http://morgansea.tumblr.com/post/144071135332/i-wanted-to-make-a-silly-comic-for-a-presentation

title: Muscle Memory of Tony Hawk
name: Morgan Pea
text: 2 other presentations i saw, one with a trombone and performer taking direction from a vibrating belt and another about the virtual sensations felt by playing Tony Hawk Pro Skater - rad!
